OOC- If Wolfblade would look over her head, she would see Malice snoozing away.  And don't worry, I make lots of mistakes when I'm tired too.
 
Malice snored audibly, but not loudly.  He would occasionally roll onto one side, but generally slept well.  A few megacycles later, his alarm went off, and he grundgingly crawled out of his hammock.  He slowly made his way to the mess hall to find a cup of energon.  He noticed it was exceedingly quiet.  That was due to the fact that he was oblivious to everyone else until he had at least one glass of refined energon.

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
<shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She slept soundly as she was placed in her quarters.  She turned 
over 
> and transformed into wolf mode in her sleep.  She moaned and 
muttered 
> in her sleep, tossed and turned as her mind reeled in visions that 
> would make Unicron scared. 
> 
> She finally woke up and got out of bed.  She stretched her front 
paws 
> out and arched her back.  She walked out of her room and was about 
to 
> go to the mess hall. She stopped dead in her tracks as her optics 
> widened with the a thought. "I didn't go to bed last night. I was 
in 
> the lab. How in the pit did I make it to my room if I never left 
the 
> lab?"  She went back to her room. She could sniff the scent of 
Malice 
> still lingering on the side of the bed where he brushed up putting 
> her on it. She grinned and starting back to the mess hall. "Uh huh, 
> yeah, he's a softy alright. But I won't let him know that I know 
> that."  She muttered to herself.  She went to the mess hall and 
> transformed into bot mode. She got herself some hot energon and sat 
> down at a table, trying to wake up.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice was jolted awake from Campflage's sream, and fell off his 
> bed with a very loud thud.  He picked himself up off the floor and 
> stood up too fast, stumbled a second, then went out the door.  He 
> went looking for Camoflage, but was unsucessful.  He then found 
> Wolfblade fast asleep at a work bench.  He picked her up and took 
her 
> to his quarters.  He set he on the bed and retrieved the generator 
> she was working on.  He set it on the night stand, and went to the 
> cargo bay.  He found a cargo net strong enough to support his 
> weight.  He took it back to his quarters, string it up as a 
hammock, 
> grabbed the alarm clock, climbed into the hammock, hit the lights, 
> and went to sleep.
> > 
> > 


---------------------------------
